Key Match Events: Ohtani's performance included a triple, a walk, two runs scored, and one RBI.
The Angels intentionally walked Ohtani to face Mookie Betts, who homered on the first pitch.
The game went into extra innings with a 6-2 final score in favor of the Dodgers.
Pre-Game Insights: Ohtani was greeted with a standing ovation before his first at-bat.
The crowd showed appreciation for his return, chanting 'MVP' during his at-bat.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked Ohtani's first meaningful September game at Angel Stadium.
